per_and_greet: ^I have no idea what I'm doing please help

c-0: ^ I've got this in the bag.
^That's my man! You're gonna crush this!
c-1: ^ To be perfectly honest, I'm a bit nervous.
^Don't worry, I'm sure you'll be fine.
^Yeah, you'll get the hang of it. Think of it like the first time Orion took us seal hunting!
^Yeah! You were so worried about falling into the hole.
^But now look at you! You're one of the best hunters in the village!
c-2: ^ I have no idea what I'm doing. This is going to go horribly.
^You remember Percy's? He had barely left the shore when-^B
^Just take a deep breath and remember your mission.
^...and make sure to hold on to your iceberg.
